Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: D. B. Roe "Average Joe"
Reviews.Content: I do a lot of work at my kitchen table, and this laptop with wireless connection is great. Saves me from going back and forth to my desktop. Price is really great!

Reviews.Title: For the love of god
Reviews.Author: Lynn Connaughty
Reviews.Content: For the love of god do not buy this laptop. It is an over priced, underpowered, fancy looking piece of crap. It will not only struggle to run multiple tabs in your web browser, but even watching a video is a struggle for this laptop. God forbid you try to do something else on it when you're watching a video. Sure the touch screen is entertaining for a while, but your never use it after a few weeks and it eats battery life like no bodies business. Take the money you could spend on this and buy yourself a laptop that can actually function
